document.full_text: the european union set the date on monday for the launch of the first satellites in its galileo global navigation system and said the long-delayed program would come in below budget.
document.title: eu lowers price tag for galileo satellite project
lines_and_colors: the european union set the date on monday for the launch of the first satellites in its galileo global navigation system and said the long-delayed program would come in below budget.
